oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Students at the Barracks
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Students; Dormitories; Housing
oai_dc:dc.dc:description:
Christian Brothers Junior College students posed outside their barracks. Far right: Jay Pleasants; the other students, unknown.
The barracks--military surplus post-war--were erected in campus in 1946 and first occupied in February 1947. One unit housed thirty single veterans; the other provided housing for three married couples.
